name: Storybook Painterly
description: Soft, illustrative, painterly style suitable for narrative-driven scenes and story-focused games.

texture_guidance.usage_notes: Textures should remain subtle and support hand-painted strokes rather than dominate them.

workflow_hints.notes: Encourage keeping lighting separate for flexible paint-over adjustments.

restrictions.notes: Avoid sharp edges and photographic textures to maintain an illustrative feel.
